seo.title: Title Loans Miami FL | Fast Cash at Brickell Branch | Direct Title Loans
seo.metaDescription: Need cash today in Miami? Get a title loan near Wynwood Walls and Art Deco District. Take I-95 Exit 12 to our Downtown location. Approved in 30 minutes.

hero.h1: Fast Title Loans in Miami, FL
hero.subheadline: Get cash in 30 minutes at our Downtown Miami location near Wynwood Walls

localProof.headline: Where to Find Us in Miami
localProof.directions: We are conveniently located at 1200 Brickell Avenue, right across from Vizcaya Museum & Gardens and just down the road from Bayside Marketplace. If you are taking I-95, take Exit 12 for Downtown Miami.

productLinks.headline: What Vehicles Can You Use for a Loan in Miami?
productLinks.intro: While most customers in Miami-Dade County use their car, we accept a variety of vehicles at this branch:

services.name: Car Title Loans
services.description: Use your vehicle title as collateral to get fast cash. Keep driving your car while you repay the loan.

services.name: Online Title Loans
services.description: Apply for a title loan entirely online. No store visit required - we come to you for vehicle inspection.

services.name: Same Day Title Loans
services.description: Get approved and funded in as little as 30 minutes. Same-day cash when you need it most.

services.name: Bad Credit Title Loans
services.description: Your credit score is not a major factor. We focus on your vehicle's value and ability to repay.

services.name: Title Loan Refinancing
services.description: Refinance your existing title loan for better rates, lower payments, or additional cash.

services.name: Motorcycle Title Loans
services.description: Use your motorcycle title to secure fast cash. Same quick approval process as car title loans.

services.name: Truck Title Loans
services.description: Get cash using your truck title as collateral. Higher loan amounts available for commercial vehicles.

services.name: RV Title Loans
services.description: Unlock the equity in your recreational vehicle. Competitive rates for RV and camper title loans.

services.name: Title Loan Buyout
services.description: We pay off your existing title loan with another lender and offer you better terms.

services.name: Commercial Vehicle Title Loans
services.description: Business owners can use commercial vehicle titles to access working capital quickly.

stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Title Loan Laws in Florida
stateCompliance.content: Residents of Miami are protected by Florida's Title Loan Act (Chapter 537) and Consumer Finance regulations enforced by the Office of Financial Regulation.
keyPoints: 30% APR cap on first $2,000 of loan amount
All lenders must be licensed by FL OFR
Written loan agreement required by law
10 days written notice required before vehicle sale
Surplus from sale must be returned within 30 days
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is for general educational purposes only and may not reflect the most current legal developments. Laws and regulations change frequently. Always consult with a licensed attorney or contact the Florida Office of Financial Regulation at (850) 487-9687 or visit www.flofr.gov for the most accurate and up-to-date information before making any financial decisions.

reviews.name: Maria G.
reviews.text: The Brickell location made everything so easy. I was in and out with cash in under an hour. Staff was professional and explained all the Florida regulations clearly.

reviews.name: Carlos R.
reviews.text: I needed emergency cash for rent and Direct Title Loans came through. The 30% APR cap in Florida made this much more affordable than I expected. Great service near Bayside.

reviews.name: Jennifer L.
reviews.text: Found them easily right off I-95 Exit 12. The team at the Miami location was friendly and got me approved quickly. I kept driving my car the whole time.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Cities
nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our Miami location? We also serve:

faq.question: Where is your Miami location?
faq.answer: Our Miami branch is located at 1200 Brickell Avenue, Suite 400, right across from Vizcaya Museum & Gardens and near Bayside Marketplace. Take I-95 Exit 12 for the quickest route to our Downtown Miami location.

faq.question: What are your hours in Miami?
faq.answer: We're open Monday through Friday from 9 AM to 7 PM, and Saturday from 9 AM to 5 PM. We're closed on Sundays. Walk-ins are welcome at our Brickell location.

faq.question: What are the title loan interest rate caps in Florida?
faq.answer: Florida has tiered APR caps: 30% on the first $2,000, 24% on amounts between $2,000-$3,000, and 18% on amounts over $3,000. This is regulated by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation under Chapter 537.

faq.question: Do I need an appointment at the Miami location?
faq.answer: No appointment needed! Walk-ins are welcome at our Brickell location. However, you can apply online first at directtitleloans.com to speed up the process when you arrive.

faq.question: What do I need to bring to the Miami branch?
faq.answer: Bring your vehicle, clear title in your name, valid Florida driver's license or state ID, proof of income, proof of Miami-Dade County residence, and proof of vehicle insurance. We'll handle the rest.

faq.question: How much can I borrow in Miami?
faq.answer: Loan amounts in Miami range from $100 to $25,000 depending on your vehicle's value. Most customers receive between 25-50% of their car's market value. The median household income in Miami is $59,390, and we work with customers across all income levels.

ctaSection.headline: Ready to Get Cash in Miami?
ctaSection.subheadline: Visit our Brickell Avenue location or apply online now
